title: Flight of Apollo 7
creator_credit: Hearst Metrotone News and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: Many remarkable and memorable shots of the Apollo 7 moon test flight which took place in October 1968. Shows the three astronauts Walter Schirra, Donn Eisele and Walter Cunningham in their cabin while in orbit.
creator_credit_for_label: Hearst Metrotone News and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
